item.title: Amal El-Mohtar & Max Gladstone, This Is How You Lose the Time War
item.description: This Is How You Lose the Time War is a short novella about two members of opposing factions (Red and Blue) engaged in a ’time warâ€™: that is they travel in time and attempt to erase each other’s existence. Except that one day Red decides to taunt Blue with a letter, and a correspondence emerges.
